item.title: Maximum Entropy Reinforcement Learning via Energy-Based Normalizing Flow
item.description: MEow, a novel MaxEnt RL framework, achieves superior performance by unifying policy evaluation and improvement steps, enabling exact soft value function calculation without Monte Carlo approximation.
